Docs.summary: The AudioFormat class is used to access a number of audio format and channel configuration constants.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Return the channel count.
Docs.value: the channel count derived from the channel position mask or the channel index mask. Zero is returned if both the channel position mask and the channel index mask are not set.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Return the channel index mask.
Docs.value: one of the values that can be set in Builder#setChannelIndexMask(int) or AudioFormat#CHANNEL_INVALID if not set or an invalid mask was used.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Invalid audio channel mask

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Return the channel mask.
Docs.value: one of the values that can be set in Builder#setChannelMask(int) or AudioFormat#CHANNEL_INVALID if not set.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
